prompt: Design a retro-styled admin dashboard with a light theme inspired by 80s aesthetics. Include a top navigation bar with the title 'Retro Admin' in a pixelated font style, a user profile avatar, and a notification bell icon. Display four statistical cards in a single row, showing Total Users (2,134), Revenue ($67,430), Orders (1,056), and Growth Rate (15.3%) with neon colors (neon blue, neon green, neon pink, neon purple), black text, and no shadows. Below, include a 'Recent Activities' section with a vertical list of 5 activity items, each with a square avatar, description, and timestamp. Place a floating action button with a plus icon in the bottom-right corner. Use bold typography, vibrant colors, and Material Design with a retro twist.
